title: XPLORE
description: A travel website that allows users to research cities and discover top sights and restaurants. Users can sign up, save unique trips, and share trips with friends.

title: Tech Talk
description: A professional networking site for women in tech. A community where members can ask questions, exchange ideas, and connect with each other.

title: Google Books Search
description: A React app that allows users to search for books through the Google Books API. Users can save their favorites to a saved list, they can also delete books from their list.

title: Music Album Memory Game
description: A React app that tests users' memory and keeps track of images that have been clicked in a game.

title: Fitness Tracker
description: A fitness app using MongoDB that allows users to track their workouts.

title: Yelp for Help
description: A program built using the Yelp and FOIA APIs. Allows users to search for restaurants and local auto theft rates to determine if an area is safe to park.

title: Burger Eater
description: A restaurant app utilizing Handlebars.js that allows users to create and 'devour' burgers.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: A weather dashboard built using the Open Weather API to display weather conditions based on user inputs.
